Hi Ken,
=C2=A0
many auction houses work the same=C2=A0way even here in the =
States where shipping is concerned. Collectors I know resort to doing as Da=
le suggests, find a trustworthy local 3rd party. 
=C2=A0
auguri, Franco

--=

Ken,

I read your e-mail =
about the shipping charges from Bonhams for the tsuba purchase. You might w=
ant to consider whether a London based collector could do you a favor, pick=
 up and ship the tsuba to you. I would suggest finding out from Bonhams how=
 someone could be authorized to get the tsuba and then inquiring on the Nih=
onto message board if someone would be willing,

Dale Garbutt

____________=

From: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com [mailto:nihontostud=
y@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Kenneth Wilson
Sent: Wednesday, May 18, 201=
1 3:28 AM
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com; nihonto@yahoogroups.com
Subject=
: [nihontostudy] auction ripoff

Hi all,

I just wanted to warn anyone bidd=
ing on auctions to be careful of total ripoff
shipping policies. Bonhams in=
 England quoted me a price of 141 english pounds
to ship 1 regular tsuba. I=
 got a quote from mailbox etc which is around 100 and
that is still disgust=
ing. I know it costs about $20 usd say around 15 pounds
to ship. I emailed =
when I got the original quote and said you must be
mistaken. They said that=
 quote is correct, they use an outside vendor but the
item will be delivere=
d to my doorstop. where else would it be delivered to? I
figured at those p=
rices if they have 5-6 customers in NY they could actually
send a person by=
 plane to hand deliver. I am debating what to do, but since I
haven't gotte=
n a response back asking to speak to a person in charge, it looks
like I wo=
n't be a customer of theirs ever again. I am a strong believer in
providing=
 customer service but when an action like this occurs, it just shows me
the=
y don't really care. 3rd party or not you as a company are responsible for
=
the entire experience. If they chose the vendor, it is still part of their
=
service. I am just amazed at how much of a ripoff is being allowed to go on=
.
So be warned and be careful, a company I thought was reputable is a place=
 I
don't think is acting in a reputable manner.

Hope all of you have bette=
r experiences.
Ken
